channel.title: Tops on Cosmiqo
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Cosmiqo

item.title: About Cosmiqo
item.description: Founded in 2013 in the trade hub of Singapore, Cosmiqo seeks to empower global supply chains with analytics and optimization engines enabling increased productivity, orchestration and visibility for supply chain operations. With one warehouse, one robot fleet and one data point at a time, Cosmiqo is transforming supply chains with data and A.I. and the outlook for many large global businesses. Our goal is to realise tomorrow’s fulfilment, today. Logistics is one of the most integral part of the global economy.

item.title: Cosmiqo Addresses Today's Warehousing Challenges
item.description: Solutions Use Cases Warehouse Management Systems Robot Management Systems Automation ➔ Contact Sales Use Cases - Modules IRIS Router IRIS Pax IRIS Batch IRIS Simulator IRIS Robot Controller Increase pick productivity by as much as 40% Instant impact on pick productivity per hour with IRIS Router’s optimization of pick sequence and distance reduction.

item.title: Cosmiqo Litesense®
item.description: City-wide Analytics. For Street Lighting. The measurement of street lighting intensity has always been manual. That's right. Handheld lux meter, standing in the middle of the road, trying not to get hit, trying to get decent readings. Trying again. And again. We've changed the way it works. Purpose Cosmiqo Litesense® was designed to provide analytical insights into the safety of roads through the brightness of street lights.

item.title: Elevate current operations with
item.description: What is the Largest Problem Most Warehouses Face? The answer is dead-time. Dead-time is time where there’s no actual productivity i.e. during travelling. More than 35% of operations is dead-time. Most businesses are losing a significant portion of their productivity to dead-time without knowing it. Supercharge Productivity IRIS for people-centric warehousing enables faster, more accurate, and flexible operations in order to attain greater warehouse throughput. Increase warehouse velocity Less dead-time means more time fulfilling jobs and increasing revenues.

item.title: Join the team. Make a difference.
item.description: We're hiring There are some pretty fun and pioneering projects up in the pipeline. From sensor-fusion platforms to geospatial analytics, we are in a position to meddle around with and develop some mind-numbing applications. If you resonated while reading this, you, like us, would never have to work a day in your life (Confucius was a smart man) and do consider joining us. Open positions Infrastructure Engineer Full time / Intern Make people happier through finely-tuned systems

item.title: Leadership
item.description: × Koh Niak Wu, Ph.D. Founder, CEO + CTO LinkedIn Dr Koh specialises in supply chain analytics, strategy execution and operations management innovation. He is an Intellectual Transcendences recipient recognised by the China Productivity Centre. "Let's not forget that it is you and me vs the problem, NOT you vs me" × Lemuel Low Chief Business Officer LinkedIn Lemuel is an aspiring disruptor and is constantly searching for ways to use data analytics and research to complement and enhance processes.

item.title: MAVIS™
item.description: Visibility of Operations MAVIS™ is an integrated software/hardware platform that enables the Industry 4.0 journey. MAVIS™ provides full visibility of operations through a resilient sensing backbone and powerful analytics engine. Other application areas that will benefit from such visibility include warehouses, manufacturing sites, smart cities and logistics systems. Purpose MAVIS™ is a special-built system that provides analytical insights to amplify manufacturing operations. Benefits Value-adding, compact and modular.

item.title: Newsroom
item.description: Featured in In the News 500 Startups | Apr 18, 2021 Meet The Startups From Batch 3 ➔ Read article IEOM Society | Mar 10, 2021 Keynote Speakers - IEOM Speakers 2021 ➔ Read article Goldbell

item.title: Plan assets and execute operations with certainty
item.description: Analyze and Allocate Accurate warehouse asset and layout planning is often a pipe dream. It is usually done soley experientially or experimentally. And it's near impossible to determine the optimal amount of resources and layout required for maximum efficiency. IRIS Warehouse Simulator gives you the visibility and ability to make the best decisions. Forecast Impact Identify potential demand and operational variables, execute data-driven planning effectively. Simulate Operations Simulate operations in virtual layouts and simulations without implementing any costly and permanent physical changes.

item.title: Take Advantage of Our Partner Ecosystem
item.description: Be Part of Tomorrow's Fulfilment, Today. Resellers Cosmiqo resellers are trained and certified partners that sell and implement Cosmiqo solutions. ➔ Technology Partners Cosmiqo combines best-in-business warehouse management providers with leading vendors for warehouse software, hardware, infrastructure, and more. ➔ Service Enablers Cosmiqo empowers service providers to deliver reliable, and cost-effective warehouse planning services to customers.

item.title: Tomorrow’s Fulfilment, Today.
item.description: What Does IRIS Stand For? Intelligent Real-time Information System , or IRIS™ in short, is the backbone for Cosmiqo’s A.I. and proprietary algorithms used in decision-making. By taking years of experience, millions of data points and trillions of possibilities, IRIS derives the best possible outcome for your warehousing operations. With IRIS, we take the ‘ifs’ and ‘maybe’ out of warehousing operations and give you only the best actions to take without any changes to your operation.

item.title: Transform robotic operations with
item.description: Universal and Undispusted Platform for your Robotics Fleet IRIS Robot Controller enables faster, more accurate, and flexible robot operations in order to attain greater warehouse throughput. Cross-platform coordination One robot controller for any type of robot, brand or operations. Never be hardware and system-dependent again. Supercharge warehouse velocity Increase robot productivity with greater job coordination and optimised periphery actions for higher throughput and quicker robot ROI.

item.title: Why Cosmiqo?
item.description: Why Cosmiqo Legacy Challenges Optimize the Present Orchestrate the Future See Everything Customer Experience ➔ Contact Sales Challenges Legacy Is Not Ready for the Future Dead time in operations today means much more than ever, affecting not only your operational excellence but also customer satisfaction and price competitiveness.
